SELECT ID, TO_CHAR(MC_FIRST, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MC_FIRST", MC_CYCLE, MC_PERIOD , TO_CHAR(MC_LAST, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MC_LAST", TO_CHAR(MC_UPDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , MC_PRECYCLE, MC_DELETE FROM MENSTRUAL_CALENDAR WHERE ID=#{id} AND MC_DELETE='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENSTRUAL_CALENDAR VALUES( #{id} , TO_DATE(#{mcFirst},'YYYY-MM-DD') , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , TO_DATE(#{mcFirst},'YYYY-MM-DD')+28 , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT )
INSERT INTO M_CALENDAR_OVULATION VALUES( SEQ_MCO.NEXTVAL , #{id} , TO_DATE(#{mcLast},'YYYY-MM-DD')-19 , TO_DATE(#{mcLast},'YYYY-MM-DD')-12 , DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT MCR_NO, ID, TO_CHAR(MCR_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MCR_START", TO_CHAR(MCR_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MCR_END", MCR_DELETE FROM M_CALENDAR_RECORD WHERE ID=#{id} AND MCR_DELETE='N'
SELECT MCO_NO, ID, TO_CHAR(MCO_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MCO_START", TO_CHAR(MCO_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MCO_END", MCO_DELETE FROM M_CALENDAR_OVULATION WHERE ID=#{id} AND MCO_DELETE='N'
SELECT MCR_NO, ID, TO_CHAR(MCR_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MCR_START", TO_CHAR(MCR_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MCR_END", MCR_DELETE FROM M_CALENDAR_RECORD WHERE ID=#{id} AND MCR_START >= SYSDATE AND MCR_DELETE='N'

SELECT MCO_NO, ID, TO_CHAR(MCO_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MCO_START", TO_CHAR(MCO_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MCO_END", MCO_DELETE FROM M_CALENDAR_OVULATION WHERE ID=#{id} AND MCO_START >= SYSDATE AND MCO_DELETE='N'
mapper.update: UPDATE MENSTRUAL_CALENDAR SET MC_LAST=(SELECT MCR_START FROM(SELECT * FROM M_CALENDAR_RECORD WHERE ID=#{id} ORDER BY MCR_START DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) + MC_CYCLE WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(MC_LAST, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MC_LAST" FROM MENSTRUAL_CALENDAR WHERE ID=#{id} AND MC_DELETE='N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM M_CALENDAR_RECORD WHERE ID=#{id} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM MCR_START)>EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) AND MCR_DELETE='N'
SELECT MC_PRECYCLE-MC_CYCLE FROM MENSTRUAL_CALENDAR WHERE ID=#{id} AND MC_DELETE='N'
